Name: General budget support
Rationale: Follows GB Earmarking Modality F “Country-Based Pooled Fund”. Country-specific but otherwise fully flexible.

Name: Sector budget support
Rationale: Follows GB Earmarking Modality G “Directed to an aid organisation’s country operations”. Country and thematic specific but otherwise fully flexible.

Name: Core support to NGOs, other private bodies, PPPs and research institutes
Core contributions to multilateral institutions and global funds
Contributions to specific-purpose programmes and funds managed by implementing partners
GB Earmarking: Depends whether activities are global/regional or country
Rationale: Follows logic of new underlying codes.

Name: Contributions to multi-donor/single-entity funding mechanisms
GB Earmarking: Depends whether activities are global/regional or country

Name: Contributions to single-donor funding mechanisms and contributions earmarked for a specific funding window or geographical location
Rationale: Follows logic of B032 (for a specific geographical location; though unclear whether earmarking for a specific funding window should count as earmarked)

Name: Basket funds/pooled funding
GB Earmarking: Depends whether activities are global/regional or country
Rationale: Following logic of B032. In general, basket funds / pooled funds normally refer to country-level funds, so are likely to be Earmarked.
